column4: Hey folks.. I just noticed that the default Ubuntu, recently upgraded here to 11.04, does not actually install the "Gnome" package even though I have Gnome set as the default window manager
On a scale of 1 to OMGWHATHAVEYOUDONE, where would the decision to install it anyway be?
generally, installing additional window managers doesn't do anything too detrimental, the system will only use whatever the user picks at the login screen
the odd thing is that I'm already using Gnome, so .. will installing Gnome put a Gnome in my Gnome so I can Linux while I Linux?
